original_title: 20歳以上も年の離れた制服少女と一心不乱にめちゃくちゃ交尾して中出しした・・・
overview: Asuka, who works part-time at a family restaurant, is in love with Ippei, an uncle who works at the restaurant. Ippei was a useless middle-aged man who was flattered by the store manager, Hito, every day, but he was kind at heart and always cared about Asuka. Asuka was separated from her father, whom she once loved, and from that memory, she had feelings for Ippei, who resembled her father. Finally lifted the ban on vaginal cum shot! Don't miss the pure love drama with a middle-aged man who experiences the pleasure of sperm being poured into the uterus for the first time!
title: Passionate Sex And Creampie With A Schoolgirl 20 Years My Junior, Starring Asuka Hanahara
